short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detect ecommerce platform a website is using.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Want to identify the eCommerce platform a website is using? This extension makes it quick and easy!

This lightweight tool detects the eCommerce platform powering a website and provides detailed insights about it, ensuring accurate results for 40+ popular platforms like Shopify, Magento,
and WooCommerce.

How does it work?
* Open any e-commerce site
* Click the eCommerce Platform Detector icon
* Instantly see which e-commerce platform the site is using

With this extension, you'll always know the eCommerce technology behind your favorite stores! ðŸ˜Š
